attributes.action: stop the hysteria and frankly bullying tactics involved with climate change.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The hysteria surrounding climate change and carbon emissions has to stop as there is very little scientific evidence to support it and our government shouldn't be basing its policies, budgets and general out look on faulty scientific data.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
